translation: The Blessed Lord said, "Many births of Mine have passed, as well as of thine, O Arjuna; I know them all, but thou knowest not, O Parantapa (scorcher of foes)."
commentary: 4.5 many may? May My? past have passed away? Births births? Your thy? f and? Arjuna Or Arjuna? Those them? I'm I? Veda know? All of them all? Not not? You thou? Vettha knowest? Parantapa O Parantapa.Commentary You have no intuitional knowledge. The eye of wisdom has not been opened in you on account of your past actions. So your power of vision is limited and therefore you do not know your previous births. But I know them because I am omniscient.
